data.name: AuthorizationRuleNameNull
data.value: Authorization Rule name cannot be empty

data.name: CreateNamespace
data.value: Creates a Namespace

data.name: CreateNamespaceAuthorizationRule
data.value: Creates a Namespace Authorization Rules

data.name: CreateNotificationHub
data.value: Creates a Notification Hub

data.name: CreateNotificationHubAuthorizationRule
data.value: Creates a Notification Hub Authorization Rules

data.name: DeleteNamespaceAuthorizationRule_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the Namespace Authorization Rule '{0}'.

data.name: DeleteNamespaceAuthorizationRule_WhatIf
data.value: Deletes the Namespace Authorization Rule

data.name: DeleteNamespace_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the Namespace '{0}'.

data.name: DeleteNamespace_WhatIf
data.value: Deletes the Namespace and its corresponding DNS. It will remove all the Notification Hubs created in it as well

data.name: DeleteNotificationHubAuthorizationRule_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the Notification Hub Authorization Rule '{0}'.

data.name: DeleteNotificationHubAuthorizationRule_WhatIf
data.value: Deletes the Notification Hub Authorization Rule

data.name: DeleteNotificationHub_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the Notification Hub '{0}'.

data.name: DeleteNotificationHub_WhatIf
data.value: Deletes the Notification Hub

data.name: FileDoesNotExist
data.value: File {0} does not exist

data.name: NotificationHubNameNull
data.value: Notification Hub name cannot be empty

data.name: RegenerateNamespaceKey_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to Regenerate the Namespace Key '{0}'.

data.name: RegenerateNamespaceKey_WhatIf
data.value: Regenerates the Namespace Authorization Rules Primary/Secondary Key

data.name: RegenerateNotificationHubKey_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to Regenerate the Notification Hub Key '{0}'.

data.name: RegenerateNotificationHubKey_WhatIf
data.value: Regenerates the Notification Hub Authorization Rules Primary/Secondary Key

data.name: UpdateNamespaceAuthorizationRule_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to Update the Namespace Authorization Rule '{0}'.

data.name: UpdateNamespaceAuthorizationRule_WhatIf
data.value: Updates the Namespace Authorization Rule Access Rights

data.name: UpdateNamespace_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to Update the Namespace '{0}'.

data.name: UpdateNamespace_WhatIf
data.value: Updates the Namespace

data.name: UpdateNotificationHubAuthorizationRule_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to Update the Notification Hub Authorization Rule '{0}'.

data.name: UpdateNotificationHubAuthorizationRule_WhatIf
data.value: Updates the Notification Hub Authorization Rule Access Rights

data.name: UpdateNotificationHub_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to Update the Notification Hub '{0}'.

data.name: UpdateNotificationHub_WhatIf
data.value: Updates the Notification Hub properties like the PNS Credentials, TTL and the Authorization Rules
